MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G46 postcode area of Thornliebank. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:06pm. Our team are continuing to make repairs to the underground cable network but due to the complexity of the fault, we now expect your supply to be restored by 1am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:04 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
